sentence: Meanwhile, voters have filed complaints with state elections officials to disqualify Georgia Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene and North Carolina Representative Madison Cawthornboth high-profile Trump alliesfrom seeking reelection for statements they made that have been construed as supportive of the January 6 capitol riot.
author: Jon Jackson
title: Trump's Power Dealt a Blow After Tennessee GOP Turns on Him

author: Jon Jackson
title: J.D. Vance Wins Ohio Primary in Crucial Test of Trump's Power

sentence: The leader of the "Let's Go Brandon" cryptocurrency revealed that Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) traded the meme coin three weeks before NASCAR driver Brandon Brown announced he had struck a sponsorship deal with the coin, heightening suspicion from watchdogs that the beleaguered congressman may have violated insider trading laws.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Meme coin leader's admission could land Madison Cawthorn in more hot water
